Akasha Brewing Company (Australia)

Contact

Venue Review

Rather lively and friendly brewery. Standard pallet table fixtures in a small but open space. Staff are always at hand to help with questions and provide information or even to share a beer.

Opening Hours

Monday: Closed

Tuesday: Closed

Wednesday: Closed

Thursday: Closed

Friday: 2:00 – 8:00 PM

Saturday: 12:00 – 7:00 PM

Sunday: 12:00 – 5:00 PM

Akasha black IPA 8/10

Akasha hopsmith IPA 6.5/10

Akasha Korban DIPA 7/10

Akasha water buffalo 7/10

Akasha fire within 7/10

Akasha freshwater pale ale 7/10

Tradewind lager 6/10
